job_description: We are a global, multi-billion-dollar corporation – and Accounting is vital to reflecting our staggering earnings, profits, cash balances and other financial results. To meet this challenge, we implement best practices, provide general financial support, resolve queries, prepare reports and provide statistics. We also design policies and procedures that adhere to audit standards and conform to FASB and SEC guidance, as well as compliance with GAAP and Sarbanes-Oxley section 404. Join us as an Accounting Senior Analyst on our Accounting team in Bayan Lepas, Penang to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you'll achieve As an Accounting Senior Analyst , you will be responsible for preparing month end and quarter end close activities related to Vendor Funding accounting. You will liaise with regional teams on accounting close activities. You will ensure accounting activities are performed accurately and on a timely basis. In addition, you will continuously drive for accounting process improvements and ensure proper and sufficient controls are in place surrounding accounting activities. In addition, you will assist internal and external financial reporting requirements of the company are met. Equally important is to ensure adherence to company policies and the necessary Accounting treatment. Vendor Funding Accounting team is to support and work with business to track, book, invoice as well as collect the funding from vendors based on the performance on services, co-marketing, product development or purchasing activities as agreed on the contract. You will also: Support monthly accounting close, journal bookings, balance sheet reconciliations per Dell Corporate Accounting Policy Support & work with Finance / Marketing team to drive for reducing long aging receivable, outlook variance & also provides vendor collection updates. Work closely with team lead on ad hoc reporting and statutory audit requests Quarter end reporting & FLUX analysis Perform quarterly SOX audit and support SOX testing as necessary. Involve in project UAT, improve the process via simplification & standardization etc This position requires attention to detail and dealing with global business partners. The position requires strict adherence to close and reporting deadlines. The ideal candidate must demonstrate initiative, be organized and a team player. Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements: Bachelor’s Degree in Finance/Accounting or professional qualification with minimum working experience of 3 years, preferably in an accounting firm and/or MNC Excellent communication skills & proficient in English Possess strong analytical and problem solving skills, critical thinking Ability to work under pressure and tight deadlines, flexibility to work beyond regular working hours to support Global business partners Skilled in using Microsoft Office applications (Excel, Powerpoint etc). SAP S/4Hana user knowledge is an added advantage. Desirable Requirements Professional qualification like ACCA, MIA etc ​ Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
